rooms.description: A spacious area combining a welcoming entrance, living space with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and enhance Vastu principles by aligning the entry according to positive energy flow.
A functional dining space with ample seating and natural light from adjacent windows. Designed to encourage family gatherings.
Modern kitchen equipped with contemporary appliances, ample storage, and designed for efficient workflow. Vastu aligned east side placement.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Features ample natural light and strategically placed floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance relaxation.
Comfortable guest bedroom designed for occasional visitors with a balcony for fresh air, aligning with Vastu principles by maintaining harmony in sleeping quarters.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity. Features ample natural light and soundproofing to ensure a quiet working environment. Ideally positioned to the north-west to promote focus.
Area designated for laundry, storage and additional utilities, ensuring smooth functioning of the household.

openings.description: Main entry door designed to receive positive energy as per Vastu. Placed in the north-east corner.
Two-car garage door ensuring easy vehicle access while maintaining safety and functionality.
Floor-to-ceiling windows strategically placed in living areas to enhance natural lighting and visual appeal.

levels.level_description: Ground floor designed with an open plan layout integrating living spaces that foster a harmonious environment. The design incorporates Vastu principles by orienting key features such as the main entrance, kitchen, and home office appropriately, while ensuring efficient use of space on an irregular plot.
